title: O'Rourke on New Book
itunes:title: O'Rourke on New Book
description:
Author and Political Satirist P.J. O'Rourke on his book "A Cry from the Far Middle." He discusses how societal views have become more polarized and the importance of communication during times of conflict.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
